section:
ChooseBlobertForTournamentPageBehaviour Class Reference ChooseBlobertForTournamentPageBehaviour
This first of all should connect to the blob dex component, then when the LFG button is pressed it should send the selected blobert to the tournament api, ofcourse the button shouold be disabled if the user hasnt selected a blobert.
Inheritance diagram for ChooseBlobertForTournamentPageBehaviour:
Additional Inherited Members Public Member Functions inherited from Menu
virtual void Open ()
virtual void Close ()
Public Attributes inherited from Menu
bool open
bool returnable = true
string MenuName = ""
Detailed Description
This first of all should connect to the blob dex component, then when the LFG button is pressed it should send the selected blobert to the tournament api, ofcourse the button shouold be disabled if the user hasnt selected a blobert.
One thing that is overlooked right now its probably the neccessity of having a bool that shows ranked and arcade
